afvalinfo_cleanprofspbd.name: Cleanprofs Plastic cans and drink cartons

data.calendar: Add calendar entity (adds a calendar with all waste collection dates as events)

data_description.district: When you live in the municipality of Maassluis or Ouder-Amstel, only fill in the Municipality + District and leave Zip code + House number + House number suffix empty. You can find the districts for Ouder-Amstel [here](https://github.com/heyajohnny/afvalinfo/blob/master/README.md#ouder-amstel) and the districts for Maassluis [here](https://github.com/heyajohnny/afvalinfo/blob/master/README.md#maassluis).
data_description.dateformat: If you want to adjust the way the date is presented, you can do it using the dateformat option. All [python strftime options](https://strftime.org/) should work. Default is '%d-%m-%Y'.
data_description.locale: With locale, you can present the date in any language you want (this only works for the day of the week (%a or %A) and the name of the month (%b or %B)). [Here](https://www.localeplanet.com/icu/iso639.html) is a list of locales.
data_description.diftarcode: If your location supports diftar, you can specify a diftarcode.
data_description.calendar_start_time: Start time of the calendar items
